column1: I really wanna know why is Rob Kardashian’s name doesn’t start with a K? They could’ve called him Kurtis, Kane, Kirk, Kade, Kale/Kael like why was it Rob but all the girls have K’s?
Im bored and watching Keeping Up With the Kardashians because nothing else is on. I feel like my IQ is dropping every second and why they hell are they famous?
Kanye and Scott are more kardashian than rob is tbh
You’re hella excited for Kim & Kanye’s wedding.
I’ve only ever watched one episode of keeping up with the kardashians but in the one I watched Bruce Jenner ended up taking a baby chimpanzee to a playground
